replies.body: LOL the xpeke refference on Jayce.
xPeke has the record for the highest amount of CS (300 CS) by 20 Minutes by playing {{champion:61}} in the LCS

and you can see that on the jayce pic how? where? why?

you literally have no idea what you are talking about do you...
You really can't see that jayce looks like xpeke in that photo?

it looks like jayce....you know, the champ its meant to be...

its hardly a reference to anything but the actual champ its actually meant to be....

also the fastest 300 cs in LCS/pro scene including qualifying to join the LCS/pro scene is 21:30.....sooo....ummm...yeah...and peke was slower than froggen.

going off just random bull%%%% tangent same to that "jayce looks like xpeke".....

oh em gee, did you see the cyanide reference? oh em gee if you dont see it you must be bad. its SOOOO obvious thats meant to be a cyanide reference. its even got the smug smirk he had in S1 dreamhack.
To me the jayce looks like Xpeke, if you don't see that then whatever.
But people always forget the support.
I like these a lot. Can they be my Valentine instead of people?
One tear into two. Beta ♡ Alpha
